resources.string: Voodoo Galaxy S III SIM unlock
Query SIM lock as seen from system

This device is not recognized as compatible with Galaxy S III SIM unlock tool.
Lets take a look at the app description on Google play to discover the list of supported devices.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.projectvoodoo.simunlock
Ew, unlock tool could not gain root permission.\nMake sure your device is rooted and to allow superuser requests to the app when asked.\n
This free application is provided without any warranty nor support. Murphy\'s law teach us it might damage your phone or even worse.\nIf you were charged for it, get a refund.
